page.title: 08Uyeasound's oldest person.
page.content: The oldest person in Uyeasound,who is the oldest person on Unst,is 90.She is in good health because she takes walks and gardens in Summer.She also bakes. Her nephew,who runs the Eastside shop goes to her house daily for elevenses. She is related to many people in Uyeasound.Her home-help does housework and gardening. She has lived in Uyeasound for 42 years and has also lived in Glasgow, near Loch Lomond and in Argyl.She was a teacher in the local school for over 2 years. She has sean many changes in Uyeasound including the closing of the fishing station.There are now less people and less cows in Uyeasound.In her youth every family had at least 1 cow.She never really liked living in Uyeasound but family circumstances brought her back after she was married
